Focus / Reflection

May 2010

Facebook is focusing on privacy, Twitter on data and openness, Tumblr on usability and experience.

How all these associations are reflecting on you?

The first probably bothers you, the second might appear interesting, exciting to you, the third gives you satisfaction.

If I were a VC I would invest guided by the feelings a service reflects on its consumers, rather than on rational business figures and endless financial sheets, as were in the old times.

This essay is about technology. With focus on values, feelings, business.
